trans-unit.source: The data type of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />.
A binding terminal that represents the flow of data into an activity.
trans-unit.target: 表示資料傳入活動的繫結終端機。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a workflow is created that consists of a single <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> activity.
trans-unit.target: 在這個範例中，將會建立包含單一<xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> 活動的工作流程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> activity has an <xref:System.Activities.InArgument%601> named <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine.Text%2A>.

The host application creates an instance of the workflow and passes a string, which maps to the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine.Text%2A> argument of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> and is used by the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> activity.
trans-unit.target: 主機應用程式會建立工作流程執行個體並傳遞字串，該字串會對應至 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine.Text%2A> 的 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine>引數，並由 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> 活動使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data that is passed through this argument.
trans-unit.target: 透過這個引數傳遞的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> class using the specified expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的運算式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> class using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `constValue` parameter is shared across all workflow instances using this workflow definition.
trans-unit.target: `constValue` 參數會由所有使用這個工作流程定義的工作流程執行個體共用。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a `List<string>` was provided as a `constValue` and three instances were created then all three instances would be accessing the same `List<string>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`List<string>`提供做為`constValue`和三個執行個體所建立，則所有的三個執行個體就可存取相同`List<string>`。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" /> that represents the value of this <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" /> 值的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />。

trans-unit.source: An activity that represents the value of the argument.
The value of the argument.
Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化並傳回新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.DelegateArgument" />。

trans-unit.source: The new argument.
The value of the argument.
Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化並傳回新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />。

The value of the argument,

trans-unit.target: 使用指定值，初始化並傳回新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The new argument.
The value of the argument.
Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化並傳回新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />。

trans-unit.source: The new argument.
The current activity context.
Gets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified activity context.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的活動內容，取得 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the argument.
The value of the argument.
Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化並傳回新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity`1" />。

The value of the argument.

The value of the argument,
Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，初始化並傳回新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Variable" />。

The value of the argument.
Initializes and returns a new <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定值，初始化並傳回新 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The new argument.
The current activity context.
The new value.
Sets the value of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定值設定 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> 的值。
